replies.msg:
1) Plug in the console
2) Power on the router
3) Press control break then you'll see "rommon 1>"

4) Start command

! Set the startup pointer
confreg 0x2142

! reboot the router
reset

! After reboot, It will ask you the init config, answer "no"
no

! Enable mode
enable

! 千奇咪撚倒轉,之前試過打錯好麻煩
copy startup-config running-config

! 開始設定你想設定既野
configure terminal
int fa0/0
ip address x.x.x.x 255.255.255.0
no shut
end

! 設定default gateway
configure terminal
ip route 0.0.0.0 0.0.0.0 x.x.x.x

! 設定Enabel password 為 on9boy
enable secret 0 on9boy
no aaa new-model

! 新增User agentcc , 密碼為 ccagent
username agentcc password 0 ccagent

! 設定可以remote telnet入去
line vty 0 4
exec-timeout 180 0
login local

line vty 5 15
login

! 更改設個Startup pointer為原本個個
config-register 0x2102

! 跳出config mode
end

! save (平時我習慣用wr的,因為係教學所以先詳細D)
copy running-config startup-config
